title: Minor route path change to bus Route 182
articleContent:
Minor route path change to bus Route 182

From 26 June 2022, bus Route 182 Werribee Station â€“ Tarneit Station via Tarneit West will travel directly down Hogans Road over the newly built bridge onto Davis Road.

The bus will no longer travel via Bethany Road and Wootten Road.

The bus stop located just north of Bethany Road will be decommissioned and relocated approximately 130 meters on Davis Road just south of Bethany Road.

The service frequency, operating hours, and number of services will remain the same.

To plan your journey, visit Journey planner or call 1800 800 007 to order a printed copy of your timetable.
articleDescription: From 26 June 2022, Route 182 will have a minor route change due to the completion of the Hogans Road bridge in Tarneit.
